metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40145 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
** DISPUTED ** gdImageGd2Ptr in gd_gd2.c in the GD Graphics Library (akaLibGD) through 2.3.2 has a double free. NOTE: the vendor's position is "TheGD2 image format is a proprietary image format of libgd. It has to beregarded as being obsolete, and should only be used for development andtesting purposes."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40145` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.2.5-4ubuntu0.5
libgd3 - 2.2.5-4ubuntu0.5
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-4ubuntu0.5').
